info: Had over 5,000 servers and 1 million+ users, with 5 million+ monthly API calls.
Considered by users to be one of the best in its niche.
Taught me valuable skills in Python, Flask, MongoDB, and AWS.
Boasts more than 15 million members and is used on 14,800 servers.
Has facilitated over 5000 scrims and 5000 tournaments.
Uses PostgreSQL as the database management system.
Hosted on AWS Lightsail and Deployed using Docker.
Has an intuitive web dashboard for tournament management.
A custom bot for my server with an experience and leveling system.
Taught me important skills in Python, SQL, discord.py, and the Discord API.
